review: Doctor explained the issue in simple terms to my mother who was the patient. He was friendly and down to earth, and gave a good explanation of the nature of problem. Effectiveness of the treatment is yet to be seen as its been just a day since the visit. But happy with the nature of doctor and the staff.
Got a sincere advice and Dr Grdeep uppal Ortho had examin in detail, really a qualified Ortho, and shows his 47 yrs long experience in treating osteo arthritis
Doctor is very polite and listened the issue very well. Visited for joint pain . He advised a course for 2 months..hopefully the pain will go. Overall good experience till now
Explained the procedure to cure the problem i.e. knee pain/ sports injury. Nicely explained the treatment, time to recoved, precautions, medicine.

got  recovered from my ankle pain  problem, thank you  so much Doctor
